title: Colorblind Mode - The Shield from Excess Healing is Hard to See

embed.description: Post with 2 views. Excess Healing is still White in Colorblind mode

body:
Hello,

Regarding the Champion Health bar in Colorblind Mode:

The shield from excess life steal (like when you have bloodthirster or overheal, for example) is still plain white when in colorblind mode. It is too hard to distinguish it from the bright yellow health bar.

I think shield from excess life steal should be a darker shade or a darker color. Something with more contrast.

Example:

https://imgur.com/a/pdrjN7j

Thank you so much!
